preference.name: ItemRealization_skip_type_list
preference.preference_description: Defines item types that are skipped when an item assembly is realized into a collaborative design or an existing realization is updated. You must use NX 10.0.1 or later, or NX may display error messages. Valid Values: The names of closure rule names that are used during realization. The closure rules control the item types realized.
